Glovo | Barcelona, Spain | Full-time, ONSITE, VISA | http://glovoapp.com

Glovo is a Barcelona based start-up that is transforming the way consumer access local goods, enabling anyone to get nearly any product delivered in less than 60 minutes.

We are looking for world-class engineers to work in our Barcelona office. Apply if you are someone who loves working in a high-paced startup environment and solving difficult problems. If you are focused on making sure that customers get the best service possible. If you work well with other top-level engineers and enjoy giving and receiving constructive feedback that helps you grow.

- Web Developer (Intermediate/Senior). (JS, Vue.js, Python)

- Android Developer (Junior/Intermediate) (Java)

- UX/UI Designer

- DevOps Engineer

- Software Developer Intern (Python, Java)

- Backend Developer (Java)

https://glovo.recruitee.com/
